title: Salesforce Entity Relationship Diagram Step by Step Guide
excerpt: Get started managing and analyzing your metadata with Salesforce Entity Relationship Diagram Step by Step Guide.
content_markdown:
a Salesforce Entity Relationship Diagram is fastest way to orient yourself to the Salesforce data model. This visual diagram is interactive, allowing Salesforce administrators, data analysts, and other data workers understand the relational data model.

1. [Login to DataTools Pro with your Salesforce User](https://app.datatoolspro.com

)
2. Select the Salesforce objects that you would like to visualize and manage.
3. Click Entity Diagram
4. Explore, Export and share your Salesforce ERD.

## How to Visualize your Salesforce Objects Entity Relationship Diagram

[Video: How to Create Salesforce Entity Relationship Diagram](https://www.youtube.com/embed/lHfOyQRie3w?feature=oembed)

#### Salesforce Entity Relationship Diagrams Makes Visual Storytelling Simple

[![Salesforce ERD](https://datatoolspro.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/image-18.png)](https://datatoolspro.com/salesforce-entity-relationship-diagrams-make-visual-storytelling-made-simple/?utm_source=linkedin&utm_medium=organic&utm_content=gmailzap&utm_campaign=ryangpost)

One of the most useful tools in the admin or data professional’s toolkit are Salesforce entity relationship diagrams. [Read more about visual storytelling](https://datatoolspro.com/salesforce-entity-relationship-diagrams-make-visual-storytelling-made-simple/?utm_source=linkedin&utm_medium=organic&utm_content=gmailzap&utm_campaign=ryangpost)
